changelog_p: Continuously evolving for a better writing experience
cl_v010_a1: Astro Migration: Migrated the site to Astro framework, componentized refactoring, improving performance and maintainability.
cl_v010_a2: Playwright E2E Tests: Set up E2E testing framework, covering language switching, settings persistence and core scenarios.
cl_v010_a3: I18n Support: Full English and Chinese support for both landing page and extension.
cl_v010_a4: Settings Persistence: User preferences are now automatically saved across sessions.
cl_v010_a5: Character Count: Real-time character count display in the editor.
cl_v010_a6: Clear Button: Added quick clear functionality for input content.
cl_v010_a7: New Landing Page: Introduced smooth scrolling, view transitions and responsive layout.
cl_v010_a8: Privacy Policy: Standalone privacy policy page, clear and transparent.
cl_v010_a9: Store Assets: Completed and launched full set of Chrome store screenshots and assets.
cl_v010_c1: UI Refactoring: Improved sidepanel UI with separate Proofread and Rewrite modes.
cl_v010_c2: State Management: Optimized settings logic, eliminating intermediate states for faster response.
cl_v010_c3: Build System: Configured WXT build process for production-grade extension packaging.
cl_v010_f1: Env Detection: Fixed environment detection anomalies during initialization.
cl_v010_f2: Style Optimization: Fixed sidepanel layout misalignment on specific screen sizes.
cl_v010_f3: I18n Fixes: Fixed language persistence and UI sync issues across pages.
feat_p: One click for all your writing needs
f1d: Extract key points from long texts instantly
f2d: Identify and fix spelling, grammar, and punctuation errors
f3d: Refine expressions for smoother, more professional writing
f4d: Smart multilingual translation: Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean & more
f5d: Extend brief content with details and supporting arguments
s1d: Highlight any text on any webpage
s2d: Pick Summarize, Correct, Polish, Translate, or Expand in the sidebar
s3d: AI processes instantly, results appear in the sidebar
e1d: GPU-accelerated inference, fastest speed, fully local
e2d: CPU inference, best compatibility, no GPU required
e3d: Connect to OpenAI-compatible APIs for the most powerful models
pd1a: AI Proofduck promises: We do not collect, read, or store any personal information.
pd1b: Our extension provides high-quality proofreading and writing assistance while protecting your privacy. All operations run locally on your device or via secure, user-configured APIs.
pd1c: Your data always belongs to you
pd2a: This extension uses local AI models (WebLLM) or Google Gemini API for intelligent text processing.
pd2l1: Your API key is stored only in your browser's local storage
pd2l2: API requests go directly from your device to Google's servers (if using Gemini API)
pd2l3: We do not collect, transmit, or store your API key or model configurations
pd2l4: You can delete or change your API key or model settings at any time
pd3a: To be clear about our privacy commitment, here is what we never collect:
pd3l2: Your browsing history or websites visited
pd3l3: The text content you proofread or rewrite
pd3l4: Your IP address or geographic location
pd3l6: Any device or system information beyond generic diagnostics
pd4a: This extension requires the following browser permissions to provide core functionality:
pd4l1: storage: Save your settings, API keys, and language preferences to local storage
pd4l2: sidePanel: Display processing results in the browser sidebar
pd4l3: activeTab: Read selected text content for processing
pd4l4: contextMenus: Add quick actions to the right-click menu
pd4b: These permissions are used solely for the extension's core functionality and will not be used for any data collection or tracking purposes.
pd5l1: All data (settings, API keys) is stored only in your browser's local storage
pd5l2: Processed text content is not saved and is immediately cleared from memory after processing
pd5l3: When you uninstall the extension, all local data will be automatically deleted
pd5l4: View, modify, or delete your configuration at any time in the extension settings
pd5l5: Switch inference engines (local models or online API) at any time
pd5l6: Uninstall the extension at any time, all data will be completely cleared
pd6a: If you choose to use online API mode, your text will be sent to your configured API service provider (such as Google Gemini). Please note:
pd6l1: Third-party service privacy policies are determined by their service providers
pd6l2: Google Gemini API Privacy Policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy
pd6l3: We recommend that you carefully read the privacy policies of relevant services before use
pd6l4: You can switch to fully local WebGPU or WASM mode at any time to avoid data transmission
pd7a: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please open an issue on our GitHub repository. We are committed to responding promptly.
pd7b: Policy Updates: We may update this privacy policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated in extension update notes.
